html:
7.12.21  12:58 am   what do you drink when you make music videos for your songs

     water

     because there is something about your videos that makes it seem like to drink a gallon of caffeine before you make a video

      that wouldn't make much difference, because it takes many weeks to make a music video, and the effect of a caffeine drink is probably no longer than a few hours

7.12.21  12:36 am   how do you cope with your own mortality?

      make content

7.11.21  10:48 pm   Why do people want to know so much about you?

      because i'm an idiot

7.11.21  9:33 pm   would you trust the default blender monkey with your life

      no

7.11.21  9:12 pm   Have you ever posted a question through here to yourself just because you came up with a witty answer and you wanted to flex it to your audience?

     no, that's strictly against the rules of this page. although i admit it may be impossible to prove it

     
Has this question been posted by you?

     no

7.11.21  8:39 pm   I'm sad. Do you have a cure?

      maybe

7.11.21  8:33 pm   Can you tell me about the most cool inspiration of the lyrics of a song ?

      when it's in a dream. although it's more often that i get melodies in dreams, not lyrics

7.11.21  8:10 pm   11.30.16  6:41 am

not the original asker. ready for the next step nonetheless

      11.30.16  4:36 pm

7.11.21  7:34 pm   will your next song be (mostly) major or (mostly) minor?

      major

7.11.21  4:16 pm   Can you elaborate on your definition of a genre? 

      it's mostly a mind-bending tool, for administrative purposes

7.11.21  3:50 pm   What is the 5th word of your new song?

      in

7.11.21  3:29 pm   What is life?

      an opportunity for growth

7.11.21  2:13 pm   What is your favorite musical mode?

      good mode

7.11.21  1:27 pm   What did Damien Maymdien skip in the hit classic "maybe i could eat blades of grass"

      the plot

7.11.21  12:53 pm   have you ever browsed the web

      yes, one time i browsed the whole thing

7.11.21  12:51 pm   for years, i've had this nagging idea bouncing around in my head that i'll never truly be satisfied with what i've done or with who i am. it keeps me ambitious and motivates me to grow and change and find new ways to express myself, but at the same time, it scares me. do you have experience with this feeling?

     yes

     any advice for getting over it, or at least making peace with it?

     no

7.11.21  12:43 pm   What are the consequences of being free?

      getting lost

7.11.21  11:21 am   How to get over stage fright?

      you may not like this, but you're gonna have to spend more time on stage. that's the only way. and it definitely works

7.11.21  10:40 am   can you hide some more secret (cryptograpical) codes in your videos?

      i have never hidden a secret cryptographical code in my videos

7.11.21  10:26 am   Did you ever consider creating music

      yes

7.11.21  10:09 am   Do you understand music?

      yes but not as much as it understands me

7.11.21  7:21 am   what is your goal on youtube?

      put videos there

7.11.21  5:13 am   Who inspires you?

      you

7.11.21  4:15 am   Would you walk across portugal if you had the time

      yes, preferably vertically

7.11.21  3:08 am   What's your birth chart?

      gridlock

7.11.21  2:38 am   when do you think you'll upload another reality vid? not trying to be annoying, i'm just really inspired by the reality page

      i will do everything, today hopefully

7.10.21  11:32 pm   Does 0 = 1

      it depends on the context

7.10.21  11:19 pm   will you ever retake the improv, reality or jazz sections? just curious.

      i will do everything

7.10.21  11:16 pm   Are there any musicians with similar style to you?

      all of them

7.10.21  11:16 pm   i've always thought that good music with bad lyrics is still good music, and bad music with good lyrics is still bad music. would you say that you feel the same?

     all music is bad

     you've said that you feel that lyrics are very connected with the music, but can you enjoy a song with bad lyrics if the non-lyrical content is good enough?

     yes

7.10.21  8:18 pm   Why is the sky blue?

      i am actually looking for an efficient way to make the dam thing blue in the first place

7.10.21  6:52 pm   What is the letter that is used the most in the title of the next song?

      a

7.10.21  5:14 pm   do you find spirituality/metaphysics interesting?

      i find interests spiritual/metaphysical

7.10.21  2:29 pm   do you think its possible to understand something without knowing that you understand it?

      yes

7.10.21  2:11 pm   what are your opinions on water?

      best served dry

7.10.21  2:04 pm   whats you least weirdest dream?

      i dreamed that i was having a dream

7.10.21  11:52 am   what system do you mix your songs on? I'm trying these hi-fi headphones but I think they're adding more brightness to what I'm hearing which is in turn making my mixes sound dark. Wonder if I should just try regular apple headphones at this point

      check on as many different systems as possible, but it's also important to use what you're used to. also check other songs on the same system. it's also good to check it on the same system that you think most of your audience will be using

7.10.21  10:56 am   hi bill
ive been playing instruments since i was a kid, and music has almost always been my passion

i started writing original music like last year or so, and ive mostly done instrumentals, i wanna add lyrics to my songs, and i do have a few ideas with lyrics in them, but they are only partial ideas

its like i do get the idea for the lyrics when getting the song idea, but i cant seem to exactly say what im trying to say

any idea how i can sort this out?

thnx

      try this: open up a blank text file and go bonkers every day for several years, then when the time is right, try to write songs again, and make it a rule that you have to come up with the melody and lyrics at exactly the same time. it is not 2 separate things. it is 1 thing ('song')

7.10.21  10:24 am   is there anything you don't like about any of your songs?

      yes

7.10.21  9:07 am   are you really from outer space?

     no

     if so, what planet are you from?

      i don't consider a planet to be outer space. gotta go off the planet for that

7.10.21  8:51 am   Does your songs (I'm a princess, long long long journey, etc) have any emotional meaning for you in the lyrics? 

      yes but the strongest meaning is when the lyrics are in the music. this fully activates the lyrics for me

7.10.21  8:33 am   what bad thing did you do

      tried to crash the stock market but accidentally made it go really high instead

7.10.21  6:41 am   How did you keep yourself motivated working a year on the same project? (history of the entire world, I guess)

      i guess it's mostly the desire to flex on my neighbors with how professional i am

7.10.21  4:28 am   What is the most percussive plant?

      bamboo?

7.10.21  2:38 am   What do you like the most about making songs?

      the different angles you can represent

7.10.21  2:10 am   what got you into music

      it must have been music itself

7.10.21  1:44 am   what's more motivating to you, the end result of something or purely the satisfaction of it being made?

      the satisfaction of the end result, of it being made

7.9.21  10:10 pm   12.26.19  8:45 pm did you go back and edit the iPhone 12 into this answer after it was announced or did you seriously predict in 2019 that the iPhone 12 would have a flat edged design?

      it was fairly well known at that time that the iphone 12 would return to the flat edges and also come in smaller sizes

7.9.21  10:02 pm   What's the weirdest dream you've had?

     i have never had a weird dream

     I had a dream that instead of water parks, there were lava parks, and inside the lava park Willy wonka was leading a cult where he drowned Santa Claus in lava

Pretty strange, I would say

      that seems too predictable to be a real dream

7.9.21  7:23 pm   How do you play so good and so fast at the same time?

      it helps to think about other things. think about where you're going
